target.desc: Configure a target element to trigger component toggle; 'true' means it enables the parent DOM element, 'false' means it disables attaching events to any DOM elements; By using a String (CSS selector) or a DOM element it attaches the events to the specified DOM element (if it exists)

no-parent-event.desc: Skips attaching events to the target DOM element (that trigger the element to get shown)

context-menu.desc: Allows the component to behave like a context menu, which opens with a right mouse click (or long tap on mobile)

model-value.desc: Model of the component defining shown/hidden state; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:model-value' event) OR use v-model directive

dark.desc: Notify the component that the background is a dark color

fit.desc: Allows the menu to match at least the full width of its target

cover.desc: Allows the menu to cover its target. When used, the 'self' and 'fit' props are no longer effective

anchor.desc: Two values setting the starting position or anchor point of the menu relative to its target

self.desc: Two values setting the menu's own position relative to its target

offset.desc: An array of two numbers to offset the menu horizontally and vertically in pixels

scroll-target.desc: CSS selector or DOM element to be used as a custom scroll container instead of the auto detected one

touch-position.desc: Allows for the target position to be set by the mouse position, when the target of the menu is either clicked or touched

persistent.desc: Allows the menu to not be dismissed by a click/tap outside of the menu or by hitting the ESC key

no-route-dismiss.desc: Changing route app won't dismiss the popup; No need to set it if 'persistent' prop is also set

auto-close.desc: Allows any click/tap in the menu to close it; Useful instead of attaching events to each menu item that should close the menu on click/tap

separate-close-popup.desc: Separate from parent menu, marking it as a separate closing point for v-close-popup (without this, chained menus close all together)

square.desc: Forces content to have squared borders

no-refocus.desc: (Accessibility) When Menu gets hidden, do not refocus on the DOM element that previously had focus

no-focus.desc: (Accessibility) When Menu gets shown, do not switch focus on it

max-height.desc: The maximum height of the menu; Size in CSS units, including unit name

max-width.desc: The maximum width of the menu; Size in CSS units, including unit name

default.desc: Default slot in the devland unslotted content of the component

update:model-value.desc: Emitted when showing/hidden state changes; Is also used by v-model

show.desc: Emitted after component has triggered show()

before-show.desc: Emitted when component triggers show() but before it finishes doing it

hide.desc: Emitted after component has triggered hide()

before-hide.desc: Emitted when component triggers hide() but before it finishes doing it

escape-key.desc: Emitted when ESC key is pressed; Does not get emitted if Menu is 'persistent'

toggle.desc: Triggers component to toggle between show/hide

updatePosition.desc: There are some custom scenarios for which Quasar cannot automatically reposition the menu without significant performance drawbacks so the optimal solution is for you to call this method when you need it

focus.desc: Focus menu; if you have content with autofocus attribute, it will directly focus it
